popup.header.title.settings_detected: Your privacy and consent settings at a glance.
popup.header.title.settings_changed: Your privacy and consent settings have been changed, please review.
popup.header.title.settings_well_set.iab: You are denying third-party data use for all purposes.
popup.header.title.settings_well_set.fea: You have deactivated all data collection options.
popup.header.title.no_concerns: Consentric cannot access the consent controls on this website.
popup.onboarding.title: Welcome to more privacy control
popup.onboarding.description: Consentric allows you to view and change the consent you have given to websites for data processing. It works for websites that adhere to the IAB's Transparency & Consent Framework, as well as for Google and Facebook. Consentric offers more control over your direct interaction with websites making it a smart addition to third-party tracking protection powered by Cliqz. Learn more
popup.list.consent.title: Privacy Settings
popup.list.consent.list-item.disabled-he: Your consent settings can currently only be changed on the website directly.
popup.list.consent.list-item.temporary-r: This setting cannot be changed right now. Please try again in a moment.
